paper_abstract: The translocation process of a single DNA molecule through a synthetic nanopore is investigated with the help of ICC* a fast and accurate algorithm which allows to take into account dielectric boundary forces (DBF) in molecular dynamics simulations We show that dielectric contrast between water and membrane material is responsible for a remarkably high free energy barrier at low salt concentrations (C) 2010 Elsevier BV All rights reserved
paper_title: Applying ICC* to DNA translocation. Effect of dielectric boundaries
